price: 73. Y de ellos obtienen beneficios (diversos) y una bebida (la leche). ¿No van a ser, pues, agradecidos?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
